caption: Task Instructions
text:
In this task, you will be asked to select a value to indicate the truthfulness level of some statements.

We will show you 3 statements along with an explanation that could have been written by a human expert or a machine learning model.

For each statement, we ask you to verify how true it is or how false it is, first by reading the explanation alone, then by doing an online search.

The data from this task is being gathered for research purposes. No personally-identifying information is recorded. Participation is entirely voluntary, and you are free to discontinue at any point.
